byline.original: Wireless to THE NEW YORK TIMES

abstract: Navicerts: German Legation in The Hague warns Netherlands and other neutrals against accepting Brit system; lists 5 points including danger of Brit econ espionage
snippet: THE HAGUE, the Netherlands, Feb. 29--A statement by the press attache of the German Legation here today warns neutrals that in accepting the British navicert system they render themselves liable to the suspicion of Germany....

headline.main: REICH WARNS DUTCH ON NAVICERT SYSTEM; Says Neutrals Who Accept British Plan Are Suspect

lead_paragraph: THE HAGUE, the Netherlands, Feb. 29--A statement by the press attache of the German Legation here today warns neutrals that in accepting the British navicert system they render themselves liable to the suspicion of Germany.
